name: Sin Sarri
description:
Team up with colourfoul heroes in this Action Clicker, and unleash elemental powers on evil spirits to cleanse the sins of your ancestors.

Deeply inspired by the Bobo culture, Sin Sarri offers an exiting clicker game experience and aims to introduce new audiences to the little known but captivating Mask Culture from Burkina Faso.

Made by

Delgery Alexandre
Michon Alexis
Millot Adrien
Sanou Nafi
Graca Océane

Student project made in 2 months.
